label.name: Name
label.label: Label
label.showOnlyStartEndTimes: Show only start and end times

tip.liveUpdate: Update last segment end time every 5 seconds
tip.showOnlyStartEndTimes: Only show time at start and end of timeline bar

help.timelineTimeFormat: Format string for timeline axis and marker labels (e.g., hh:mm a).
help.detailsTimeFormat: Format string for date and time in the details card (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm a).
